default.text:
'Balance Scale'

In Referendum 218 the community voted again on whether to open a bi-directional HRMP channel between Statemine and Shiden. A previous proposal on the topic, which has passed community vote through Referendum 204, failed because of an incorrect maximum weight in the execution call.
